item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
1928; pre-San Carlosization. Note the tall towers of First German United Methodist.

1975. The Telephone Company has been clad, but who do they think they’re fooling? Who says there’re no 20s buildings on Bunker Hill?

Both images courtesy Los Angeles Public Library
